message: I'm feeling generous, but I think we should start with a fair offer. Take 10% and we'll see how it goes.
Let's be realistic, I'll take 90% and you can have the remaining 10%.  We both know this money is worth less with every passing round, so it's best to secure a good share while we can.
Okay, I understand we both want a larger share. Let's compromise. I'll take 55% and you can have 45%.  We're getting closer to the end, so let's make this happen!
